Package ePortfolio

Class Portfolio

java.lang.Object
ePortfolio.Portfolio
public class Portfolio extends Object
This class is used to perform different operations on an ePortfolio of stocks and mutual funds

    This methods allows user to check there current gain of all their stocks and mutual funds

    This methods prints the first investment in the list to the update panel, if no investments owned it will print an error message in the messageArea

  • Method Details

    • setGUI

      public void setGUI(GUI gui)
      This methods creates an instance of a GUI to send of messages to the GUI class
      Parameters:
      gui - instance of a GUI

    • setMessageListener

      public void setMessageListener(MessageListener listener)
      This methods itializes the message listener
      Parameters:
      listener - the message listener

    • buyInvestments

      public void buyInvestments(String buyInvestType, String symbolToBuy, String nameToBuy, int quantityToBuy, double priceToBuy)
      This methods allows the user to buy a stock or a mutual fund
      Parameters:
      buyInvestType - string from buyPanel combo box
      symbolToBuy - string from buyPanel textfield
      nameToBuy - string from buyPanel textfield
      quantityToBuy - int from buyPanel textfield
      priceToBuy - double from buyPanel textfield

    • sellInvestments

      public void sellInvestments(String symbolToSell, int quantityToSell, double priceToSell)
      This methods allows the user to sell a stock or a mutual fund
      Parameters:
      symbolToSell - string from sellPanel textfield
      quantityToSell - int from sellPanel textfield
      priceToSell - double from sellPanel textfield

    • updateInvesments

      public void updateInvesments(double updatedPrice, boolean increasedPos, boolean saved)
      This methods allows the user to update all prices of stocks and mutual funds
      Parameters:
      updatedPrice - double from updatePanel textfield
      increasedPos - if we are moving forward or backwards in investment list
      saved - if we are saving the update price or not

    • initialInvestmentShown

      public void initialInvestmentShown()
      This methods prints the first investment in the list to the update panel, if no investments owned it will print an error message in the messageArea

    • getInvestmentGain

      public void getInvestmentGain()
      This methods allows user to check there current gain of all their stocks and mutual funds

    • searchInvestments

      public void searchInvestments(String symbolSearch, String keywordSearch, String lowerBound, String upperBound)
      This method allows users to search for stocks and mutual funds with 3 filters: symbol, keywords and range
      Parameters:
      symbolSearch - symbol to search for in list of investments
      keywordSearch - keywords to search for in list of investments
      lowerBound - search for investments greater than this price
      upperBound - search for investments lower than this price

    • loadInvestments

      public boolean loadInvestments(String filename)
      This methods loads all investments into the investment array list from a file
      Parameters:
      filename - - the file name to load from
      Returns:
      true if no errors opening file, false if errors --> set file to default.txt

    • writeInvestments

      public void writeInvestments(String filename)
      This methods writes all investments from the investment array list into a file
      Parameters:
      filename - - the file name to load from
